title: How to Unmould a Jelly

steps.headline: Fill a bowl with warm water.
steps.description: The bowl should be larger than the jelly mould.

steps.headline: Place the mould in the warm water.
steps.description: Be careful not to submerse the jelly!

steps.headline: Allow to stand for just a few seconds and then remove.
Turn out the jelly.
steps.description: It should keep its shape perfectly.

steps.headline: Fill a bowl with hot water.
Dip the jelly mould into the hot water three times.
Place on a firm bench.
steps.description: Press the jelly around the edge, using your finger. Gently pull away from the edge around the whole jelly.

steps.headline: Turn the jelly mould onto a plate.
steps.description: Place your hands over both the base of the plate and the base of the mould. Shake quickly and sharply and the jelly should release.

tyn: Bowl large enough to fit jelly mold
